txt.en: Scouting the North-gate
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around

'At any moment the Rohirrim may come to our aid. I will welcome them like my own brother.

'As I await the arrival of the Rohirrim, my men scout the land north of the Out-wall, while we hold the northern gate from the enemy.

'I am afraid to leave the North-gate unattended as many spies of the enemy roam nearby. Would you check in with my men upon the wall in my stead so I may learn what they have seen today?'
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around

'Look closely out there and you will see men on horseback in the fields north of here. It is not the Rohirrim though...\n\nEasterling riders patrol the fields of Talath Anor. Perhaps they know of the Rohirrim and plan to ambush them?'
The second Gondorian warrior in Ingold's command can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should look around the area.
Speak with the second Gondorian warrior
The third Gondorian warrior in Ingold's command can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should look around the area.
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around
Across the river lies an army of Orcs and Easterlings from the north
Speak with the third Gondorian warrior
The fourth Gondorian warrior in Ingold's command can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should look around the area.
Speak with the fourth Gondorian warrior
Indeed, the east of Pelennor Fields is overrun with the enemy
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around

'I see. So, [placeholder], it seems there is much to be done if we are to make safe passage for the Rohirrim when they approach this great city.\n\n'I am counting on you for assistance in this matter.'
The first Gondorian warrior in Ingold's command can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should speak with the first Gondorian warrior.
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around
Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
'Nothing stirs upon the mountainside today. See for yourself.\n\n'Just don't tell Ingold that I've nearly fallen asleep up here!'
Ingold, captain of the Out-wall, asks of you to speak with his scouts upon the Rammas and relay their information to him.
Speak with Ingold
Speak with the first Gondorian warrior
Easterling riders patrol the fields of Talath Anor
The first Gondorian warrior can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should look around the area.
The second Gondorian warrior in Ingold's command can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should speak with the second Gondorian warrior.
The third Gondorian warrior can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should speak with the third Gondorian warrior.
The fourth Gondorian warrior in Ingold's command can be found upon the northern Out-wall.\n\nYou should speak with the fourth Gondorian warrior.
Indeed, the mountainside looks quiet
Take a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around
'I am concerned with what I have been watching today. Look across the river and you will see men and Orcs preparing for war!'

'I've been watching Pelennor Fields and the news I have is nothing that Ingold does not already know. The eastern fields are overrun with the enemy.\n\n'However, I have noticed some of the northern forces are starting to converge with the forces already in Pelennor. I fear war is upon us.'
